item.title: Additem ?!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

ok so i got a lil problem in my dialogue i put it so that wen you talk to this pirate he gives you a key and wen i test it in game, or wen it finally gets to that dialogue it gives me a infinate amout of keys like its doesnt just give one it gives until im out of inventory space heres my code

case 157: talk2("Use the portal behind me you will", " need this though,", 3155); addItem(3465, 1); break;
